page.title: 09FILKINS: CLUBS (cont)
page.content: HAPPY CIRCLE OVER SIXTIES CLUB: opened in 1967 with music-hall stars Gert and Daisy the guests of honour. 65 members from Filkins and other villages. Two meetings a month, plus coffee evenings to raise funds for outings & Christmas Dinner. Holidays are also organised. EXPLORERS & PATHFINDERS: Clubs run by the vicar & his wife for under 11s (20 from Broadshire parishes) & 11-15s (12 from Filkins & Broughton Poggs). The Church Pastoral Aid Society provides back-up for weekly meetings and offers adventure holidays in UK. The PARISH COUNCIL OPEN-AIR SWIMMING POOL was opened in 1936. The very cold water comes up 95ft from a bore hole. The original pump is still in use, but now a filtration plant has made the prev- ious frequent renewal of water unnec- essary. The Pool is surrounded by grassy banks -fine for family picnics!
